welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Wheatfield, where small town charm meets big city convenience! Known for our beautiful parks and friendly community, we invite you to discover all that our city has to offer and make unforgettable memories."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Niagara Falls International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Buffalo Niagara International Airport houses all major airlines and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 at Buffalo Niagara International Airport is primarily used for regional and low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at St Catharines Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at St Catharines Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.
